summary:
### April 2025 Summary for scaffold-eth/buidlguidl-v3

- **Feature Enhancement**: 
  - Merged PR #126 to fetch Builder Challenge data from the new SREv2 API, improving the integration of builder data in the application.

- **Issue Resolution**: 
  - Closed issue #124 regarding the update of SRE challenges table data origin on the builders page, ensuring new builders from SREv2 can see their challenges.

- **Overall Theme**: 
  - Focus on integrating new data sources (SREv2) to enhance user profiles and builder experience.

topIssues.title: Update SRE challenges table data origin in builders page

topPRs.title: Fetch SREv2 builder data from SRE v2
